LanguageData.VPE_Recharge.label: recharge
LanguageData.VPE_Recharge.description: Electricity is being channeled to a nearby battery.
LanguageData.VPE_Vortex.label: vortex
LanguageData.VPE_Vortex.description: An electirical vortex is causing difficulty moving.
LanguageData.VPE_Hurricane.label: hurricane
LanguageData.VPE_Hurricane.description: A hurricane is causing difficulty moving and seeing.
LanguageData.VPE_Bliss.label: bliss
LanguageData.VPE_Bliss.description: Waves of serenity emanate deep from within, bringing peace of mind and lowering consciousness.
LanguageData.VPE_AgeSickness.label: age sickness
LanguageData.VPE_AgeSickness.description: Age-related psychic sickness greatly reducing manipulation and consciousness.
LanguageData.VPE_PsychicDrone.label: psychic drone
LanguageData.VPE_PsychicDrone.description: A strong psychic force affecting every enemy humanlike in the area, making them feel more disturbed, terrified, and paranoid.
LanguageData.VPE_IceShield.label: ice shield
LanguageData.VPE_IceShield.description: A psychic shield that protects from hypothermia and freezer enemies that interact with it.
LanguageData.VPE_FrostRay.label: frost ray
LanguageData.VPE_FrostRay.description: A heavily damaging and freezing ray of frost.
LanguageData.VPE_IceBlock.label: frozen solid
LanguageData.VPE_IceBlock.description: This entity is completely frozen in a block of ice, and will not be able to move until it melts.
LanguageData.VPE_BlizzardSource.label: casting blizzard
LanguageData.VPE_Blizzard.label: blizzard
LanguageData.VPE_Blizzard.description: A huge wind with extreme snow that lowers sight, manipulation and movement speed.
LanguageData.VPE_Haywire.label: haywire
LanguageData.VPE_Haywire.description: Psychically hacked programming that disrupts the IFF operations.
LanguageData.VPE_InfinitePower.label: powering
LanguageData.VPE_InfinitePower.description: Generating infinite electricity supply to a given structure.
LanguageData.VPE_AnimalOvershield.label: animal shield
LanguageData.VPE_AnimalOvershield.description: An overshield that protects the animal from any ranged attacks.
LanguageData.VPE_Smartbuzz.label: smartbuzz
LanguageData.VPE_Smartbuzz.description: Psychically-induced feelings of clarity and curiosity. This improves research speed as well as skill gain speed.
LanguageData.VPE_Essence.label: Essence of
LanguageData.VPE_Essence.description: Psychically-split fragment of someone's personality imbued in this very being.
LanguageData.VPE_Darkvision.label: darkvision
LanguageData.VPE_Darkvision.description: Psychically-induced ability to see through the darkness and shadows.
LanguageData.VPE_Darkvision_Display.label: darkvision
LanguageData.VPE_Productivity.label: psychic productivity
LanguageData.VPE_PsychicSoothe.label: psychic soothe
LanguageData.VPE_PsychicSoothe.description: Psychically-induced, self-satisfying perceptual distortions, giving a temporary mood boost.
LanguageData.VPE_GroupLink.label: group link
LanguageData.VPE_GroupLink.description: Psychically-induced link between several entities. Any 'word of' psycast will resonate between all linked individuals.
LanguageData.VPE_PsychicPain.label: psychic pain
LanguageData.VPE_Protection.label: psychic protection
LanguageData.VPE_Protection.description: Psychically-induced physical protection from incoming damage.
LanguageData.VPE_Hallucination.label: hallucination
LanguageData.VPE_Hallucination.description: Strong psychic suggestion that reshapes reality in the eyes of the affected individuals, making them perceive their every day life as that of a luxury.
LanguageData.VPE_Liferot.label: liferot
LanguageData.VPE_Liferot.description: Psychically-induced mass necrosis, causing living and healthy limbs and organs to rot on the victim.
LanguageData.VPE_Rot.label: rot
LanguageData.VPE_GainedVitality.label: psychic vitality
LanguageData.VPE_GainedVitality.description: Psychically-induced vitality stolen from another person.
LanguageData.VPE_LostVitality.label: psychic weakness
LanguageData.VPE_LostVitality.description: Psychically-induced weakness caused by vitality being stolen by another person.
LanguageData.VPE_Ghostwalk.label: ghostwalk
LanguageData.VPE_CorpseTalk.label: corpse talk
LanguageData.VPE_CorpseTalk.description: Psychically-induced link with a spirit of a deceased individual.
LanguageData.VPE_BodiesConsumed.label: bodies consumed
LanguageData.VPE_BodiesConsumed.description: The amount of bodies that were consumed using the Consume Bodies psycast. Each body consumed increases a maximum neural heat by 1.
LanguageData.VPE_DeathShield.label: death shield
LanguageData.VPE_DeathShield.description: Psychically-induced immortality that lasts for one day.
LanguageData.VPE_Obscured.label: obscured
LanguageData.VPE_Shadowfocus.label: shadowfocus
LanguageData.VPE_Shadowfocus.description: Psychically-induced increase to psychic sensitivity based on the lack of light around the psycaster.
